title: Search Advertising Aggregated Performance Measures By Keyword
description: Search Advertising Aggregated Performance Measures By Keyword is a rolled up data of the collection of aggregated performance measures as pulled from Search Advertising Platforms by Keyword.

searchads:accountId.title: Account Identifier
searchads:accountId.description: Identifier that defines Customer/Client ID setup on the Search Advertising Platform.

searchads:campaignId.title: Campaign Identifier
searchads:campaignId.description: Campaign ID on the search advertising platform..

searchads:adgroupId.title: Ad Group Identifier
searchads:adgroupId.description: Ad Group ID on the search advertising platform.

searchads:termId.title: Search Term Identifier
searchads:termId.description: Search Term ID on the search advertising platform.

searchads:term.title: Search Term
searchads:term.description: Search Term targeted for the Ad.

searchads:matchType.title: Term Match Type
searchads:matchType.description: Match Type associated to the Search Term being targeted for the Ad.

searchads:searchEngineId.title: Search Engine Identifier
searchads:searchEngineId.description: The application-specified identifier used to identify the Search Advertising Platform Name.

searchads:clicks.description: Count of Clicks for a given ad displayed on the network.

searchads:impressions.description: Count of impressions for a given ad displayed on the network.

searchads:totalCost.description: Total Advertising Spend for a given ad displayed on the network. The spend is in the account currency configured on the network.

searchads:avgPosition.description: Average Position of the Ad displayed on the network.

searchads:topPageBid.description: Top of the Page Bid Estimator. The measure is computed by the network and is not an additive measure.

searchads:qualityScore.description: Quality Score of the Keyword assigned by the network - range 1 to 10. This is not an additive measure.

searchads:device.title: Device
searchads:device.description: The device from where the ad was displayed.
